tests.comment: Seems to work fine but there are a lot of graphical issues. Can be fixed by setting environment variable MVK_CONFIG_FAST_MATH_ENABLED=0.
tests.author: emiyl

tests.comment: Runs first few frames, then crashes. Type float4 is not compatible with a MTLPixelFormatRGBA16Uint color attachement.
tests.author: emiyl
